official-title.#text: To amend the Intelligence Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2010 to facilitate access by the Comptroller General of the United States to information in the possession of the intelligence community, and for other purposes.

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: is amended by adding at the end the following new subsections:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Section 348 of the Intelligence Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2010
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Intelligence Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2010/s:348

header.#text: Access to information by the Comptroller General of the United States

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , the head of each element of the intelligence community shall—
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Intelligence Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2010/s:348/ss:a/p:1

text.#text: In carrying out the directive issued under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: with timely access to information concerning the programs and activities of the intelligence community for any audit, investigation, program evaluation, report, or review for which the
considers such information necessary; and
to the fullest extent possible and provide timely responses to requests for information;
access to information requested in furtherance of an audit or evaluation;

text.#text: carefully consider requests for information based on consultation with the

with access to the specific information requested; and
described in such directive.
